name: Renaissance KMU Schweizerische Anlagestiftung
overview: On 1 July 2009 by the General Assembly took out the resignation request of Jean-Luc Strohm note of it gave up the presidency and left the Board of Trustees. Jean-Luc Strohm, since 1997 president of Renaissance Investment Foundation SMEs, handed the torch to Daniel Liechty , to the extraordinary general meeting on 1 July 2009 in the Board of Trustees and president of Renaissance Investment Foundation selected SMEs. Renaissance PME - Swiss Investment Foundation (the Renaissance SMEs) - is a Swiss investment foundation under the supervision of BSV, the occupational pension plans has signed the Code of Conduct. The Foundation is an innovative investment vehicles available, which is reserved exclusively Swiss pension funds. The pension funds can share in the various sectoral investment groups acquire the foundation, which is itself small and medium enterprises (SMEs) involved in, what time of the acquisition of participation usually not publicly traded and is in Switzerland are domiciled in the.
